meanings.definition: The presence of glucose in the urine.
meanings.sent1: Glycosuria can be detected through urine tests.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the excretion of an abnormally large amount of sugar in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that glycosuria is a condition where the urine contains too much sugar.
meanings.sent2: People with untreated diabetes may experience glycosuria due to high blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent3: The party guests were surprised when the punch bowl turned into a fountain of glycosuria.
meanings.sent4: The streets of the city seemed to be paved with glycosuria, symbolizing the sweet excess of the population.
meanings.sent5: The smell of glycosuria in the urine was so strong, it lingered in the air like a sugary fog.
